items.title: so you're disabled...
items.summary: No matter how you became disabled, chances are there is a community to suport you. Let’s share ideas that will…
items.content_html: No matter how you became disabled, chances are there is a community to suport you. Let’s share ideas that will make our limited resources go further.

items.title: Medicare Explained
items.summary: There are so many resoures available to disabled folks, but Medicare is one that should get special attention. The outline…
items.content_html:
There are so many resoures available to disabled folks, but Medicare is one that should get special attention.

The outline of the system is well covered on Wikipedia

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Medicare_(United_States)

Here is a video explainer that outlines the different plans and how to qualify.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HgCP0uQmuRw

items.title: Discounted Internet Access
items.summary: The Affordable Connectivity Program is an FCC benefit program that helps ensure that households can afford the broadband they need…
items.content_html:
The Affordable Connectivity Program is an FCC benefit program that helps ensure that households can afford the broadband they need for work, school, healthcare and more.

Check this link to see if you qualify for discounted internet access.

https://www.fcc.gov/acp

items.title: Social Security
items.summary: The United States Social Security System is over 100 years old, and has been altered many on many occasions to…
items.content_html:
The United States Social Security System is over 100 years old, and has been altered many on many occasions to keep up with the times. This results in a complex system that means well.

If you need help navigating the system, this subreddit is overflowing with other folks who are sharing theirs tips and struggles. Join in.

https://www.reddit.com/r/SocialSecurity/
